trend.title: AI Adoption Surge in Indian Enterprises
trend.summary: Major Indian companies are rapidly adopting AI solutions to improve operational efficiency and customer experience.

outreach.subject: AI transformation insights for Zoho
outreach.body:
Hi Sridhar,

I noticed Zoho's impressive expansion in the enterprise software space and wanted to reach out regarding the current AI adoption wave sweeping Indian enterprises.

Given Zoho's leadership in business software, I believe there are some strategic opportunities worth exploring together - particularly around how AI is reshaping customer expectations.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call this week to discuss?

Best regards

trend.title: Fintech Revolution: UPI Crosses 15B Transactions
trend.summary: India's UPI ecosystem continues explosive growth, driving fintech innovation across payments, lending, and wealth management.

outreach.subject: Harshil, thoughts on the UPI explosion
outreach.body:
Hi Harshil,

With UPI crossing 15 billion monthly transactions, Razorpay is clearly at the center of India's payments revolution.

I've been tracking how this growth is creating new opportunities in embedded finance and wanted to share some insights that might be relevant to Razorpay's next phase.

Would you have 15 minutes for a quick call?

Best regards
